messages.subject: Homeschooling Resources List
messages.msgSnippet: The new Homeschooling Resources list focuses on materials and resources of interest to homeschooling families. Discuss your favorite books, videos, catalogs,
messages.messageBody:
The new Homeschooling Resources list focuses on materials and
resources of interest to homeschooling families. Discuss your
favorite books, videos, catalogs, websites, software, games,
publications, conferences and much more!

The list also welcomes press releases, product announcements, news
and information about resources of interest to homeschooling families.

To join the list send a blank email message to:
<mailto:HomeschoolingResources-subscribe@yahoogroups.com>

For information or to join the list please go to the website:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HomeschoolingResources

Another great list sponsored by the award-winning Home Education Magazine!

Helen Hegener, Managing Editor
Home Education Magazine
HEM-Editor@...
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com
